name: TheTrussvilleTribuneLocalNewsHeadlines
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Trussville Tribune is the primary news source for northeast Jefferson and south St. Clair counties in Alabama. This includes the cities of Trussville, Clay, Pinson, Springville, Argo, Margaret, Irondale and Center Point. The Tribune combines first rate newspaper reporting with original multi media content to provide readers and viewers with up to the minute breaking news, weather and sports. We cover high school sports for Hewitt-Trussville, Clay-Chalkville and Pinson Valley, Center Point, and Springville high schools.

After enabling this skill, say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear your flash briefing.

Links to the full stories from the briefing will be available on your Alexa app home screen.

You can move Trussville Tribune to the top of your flash briefing list in the settings on your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
